Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Brutal warfare on St. Roberts ends with Barnet Accords: Federated Suns reclaims the planet The three-year-long conflict on St. Roberts started in 3034 when local religious extremists, possibly exploiting the distraction of the Skye Crises, staged a coup against the Duke of St. Roberts with the aim of establishing a theocratic rule on the planet. The Crucis March Federated Suns authorities responded by deploying the Tsamma Crucis March militia from nearby Tsamma to quell the rebellion.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
What followed was a brutal three-year fight where irregular warfare could quickly transition into regular warfare at a moment's notice.


Finally, with assistance from [[DM.Factions[faction_ComStar],ComStar]], the local authorities and rebels have reached an agreement known as the Barnet Accords. This agreement will put an end to the fighting on this war-torn planet and bring it back into the fold of the [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]].


A peacekeeping force from the Tsamma Crucis March militia will remain to maintain peace.



This has been the CNB August broadcast.
